title: And Just Like That....Episode 9 Review - "No Strings Attached"
itunes:title: And Just Like That....Episode 9 Review - "No Strings Attached"
itunes:subtitle: Can we get a Seema spin off?
description:
On this week's review of And Just Like That, we talk Lily and periods (including dishing out on our own personal horror stories with tampons), how our justice for Steve train continues on (with Madz arguing that Miranda Hobbs never deserved Steve), and how we had to wait till episode 9 to see Carrie enter a club, which begs the question: are we suppose to believe that two 50+ year olds would willingly go to a club?


Join us this week as we go down the rabbit hole on all things for the new episode of the Sex and the City reboot!


Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
